text: @realDonaldTrump @MdAviation The Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act (H.R. 748, Public Law 116-136), was passed by Congress and signed by the President.  You are taking full credit for a relief program initiated by the House of Representatives and Senate.  Your ego has no limit!
